thread.section_title: Living: Weddings, Interior Design, Food, Travel, and Parties - Vogue
thread.title: 18 Best Halloween Candy Bowls

author: Madeleine Luckel
title: 18 Best Halloween Candy Bowls
text:
Halloween offers endless sweets, but for those of us on the giving end of the trick-or-treat exchange, a beautiful serving bowl to house the Snickers, Reese’s Pieces, and Jolly Ranchers may actually be your preferred type of treat. Whether spooky and scary, fall foliage–hued, or prettily patterned—All Hallows’ Eve demands a good candy bowl. Below, our 18 favorite finds.
Vogue may earn compensation on these sales through affiliate programs.
